channel.title: Maven on 空影星辉
channel.description: Recent content in Maven on 空影星辉

item.title: Linux 系统中安装 Maven
item.description: 下载 Maven 1 wget https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/apache/maven/maven-3/3.9.6/binaries/apache-maven-3.9.6-bin.tar.gz 解压 Maven 1 sudo tar xvf apache-maven-3.9.6-bin.tar.gz -C /usr/local 配置环境变量 1 sudo vim /etc/profile.d/ecs.sh 1 2 3 # MAVEN export MAVEN_HOME=/usr/local/apache-maven-3.9.6 export PATH=$PATH:$MAVEN_HOME/bin 刷新环境变量 1 source /etc/profile 验证 1 mvn -v
